name: LawSchoolFlashcards
0:
”Alexa ask law school flashcards to start the review mode”
”Alexa open law school flashcards”
”Alexa ask law school flashcards to start the quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: law school flashcards
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need help studying for the Bar or a law school exam? Get Law School Flashcards and practice your terms and definitions with help from Alexa! Hundreds of entries covering contracts, tort and criminal law will have you ready to do your best. Definitions include entries for common law, Uniform Commercial Code, Model Penal Code, the Restatements and more. Use review mode to listen to Alexa read the term, pause and then read the definition. Definitions in review mode contain examples or added information as needed for a full understanding of the term. Quiz mode is Alexa reading the term, pausing for you to recall and recite the definition and then Alexa will read the correct definition back so you can chart your progress. Definitions in Quiz mode are tailored to be more suitable for rule statements in exams. They may contain only elements or very precise language to keep your answer concise and focused. Definitions used as answers for the Quiz mode are found at www.LALawInstitute.org/answerkeyL1 

To start the skill, say "Alexa, start Law School Flashcards". From there Alexa will guide you through the process of selecting the subject and the mode.
